website_summaries.verdict: This seat may help you keep your growing child in a five-point harness a little longer, thanks to its rating up to 100 lbs. and ability to transition into a booster.
pros: Has a cup holder and arm rests
Can do three different recline positions
all the way up to 100 lbs
cons: This car seat seems to have less padding than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This seat is AWFUL. We bought it to replace the Britax seat our 3-yr-old has been in since he was an infant (we unfortunately had to replace it because the car was involved in an accident). Because we're using this for a toddler, the first thing we tried to do was move the crotch strap to the proper placement for his size. This is IMPOSSIBLE. I can't state enough--neither my husband nor I were able to get that strap through so we could move it. I feel badly for parents who bought this seat for a smaller child and had to move the crotch strap after using it for awhile. At least I can return the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jack&Wyatt'sMum

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass car seat for bad ass SUV
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit into my Traverse. Definitely have a lot of room to grow with this For the next couple years. Cover is washable. Which was determined after poo-storm 2015. On another note do not; I repeat DO NOT take your children to the hinkey truck stop on your road trip. On another other note- removable and waterproof car seat pads are well worth the investment for ANY car seat. Love the colors of this car seat and by comparison to the newer model? There are not enough new features to justify the more expensive purchaser of the bigger badder model. Love this one just fine! Easy assembly and install. Will be purchasing another for my husband's sedan. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Love Graco
customer_reviews.text: We have loved all the Graco seats we have used. Any time we buy a different brand we are ultimately disappointed. WE have purchased two of these particular seats and they have both stood up to about 4 years of wear so far and still are in great condition. Our oldest is actually using the booster feature now, which we love since its hard to find boosters with the kind of storage these offer.
customer_reviews.author: April Lynn

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My son loves that he has a cup holder on one side and a secret compartment on the other. We got this to replace a Britax seat that we weren't happy with. This one is cheaper and we like it much better. It seems less likely to stain, holds up well, easy to install, and doesn't take up too much room in our small car (two car seats and a booster in one row). Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I can say that when I had this car seat, I was very pleased with my purchase! I no longer have it because we moved and no longer needed it since we walk almost everywhere. I can say that I will purchase this car seat again in the near future when I do purchase a car! It was super easy to adjust everything and put in and take out of a two-door sports car! Once you understand how car seats work, and how to correctly put them into cars, it's a piece of cake! Thank you, Graco!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it burn it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids. Owned at least 6 seats. This is the worst. My wife and I fight NOT to use it. Horrible to move. Horrible to strap kids in. Belts get tangled. Can’t be tightened without lots of force. Just junk. Had for over a year so plenty of experience Experience with it. Save the headache.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: because I have the same one in a different color that I love. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat, because I have the same one in a different color that I love. Unfortunately, this is the worst car seat ever! Maybe I got a defective one. It is incredibly hard to tighten the straps, and the straps are super short. I can't imagine how my child will even fit in this seat in a year, with out the straps crushing him, because they can't be let out any further.
customer_reviews.author: blueherin

customer_reviews.title: Just delivered
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. Not super heavy and easily removed if needed. Latch system is good but upper latch placement is a bit confusing as the illustration has it wrapped around the headrest - should be latched to seat back anchor (Buick Enclave). Seat cushioning is a bit disappointing and under padded. We may install a foam insert under the seat cushion for additional padding for our toddler. Overall a good seat with flexibility to increase size as child grows.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, but not for babies.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these for my grand children. They should work for them until they are big enough to be out of a car seat. It can be used as a booster for older children, which makes it versatile. My grandson thinks it is great, he just started using his (because he was too small for a front facing seat until now). The only issue is it cannot be used as a rear facing seat, which is needed for babies and small children.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Forward facing perfection
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is still using his as just a bottom booster. My almost 3 year old is using as a forward facing harness and this is by far one of the best seats there is, perhaps THE BEST. Super easy for my kids to get in and out of, plenty of room to store snacks and toy cars and you cannot beat the value. For the amount of time you will be using this...it's SO WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni BTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I have always really loved graco. I do wish it had 2 cup ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these car seats. I have always really loved graco. I do wish it had 2 cup holders like our my ride 65 car seats had, but we just got spoiled having 2 I suppose! It does have little cubbys underneathe the arm rests that you are able to put little things which is nice. I love that this should be our last car seat we need to buy as it transitions all the way to a regular booster seat. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MissAthena13

customer_reviews.title: comfortable yet feels very safe
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves This car seat, and we the parents also love the safety part of it. the space for the head is wide enough to make my 5 year old comfortable, the strips can adjust and he can even buckle him self but not unbuckle which is good. It was easy to install it, it just took me 10-15 minutes after reading the instructions. Happy to have found a car seat the feels safe and that can be use for a few years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my 4 year old since she is getting big, and she hates to use booster that harnessed with seat belt. This is a very sturdy product, and all the designed details are reasonable and easy to use. I got some problem while trying to adjust the seat crotch buckle. It is made too tight and the belt is really thick to get through the slot. However I figured it out by watching the video about this problem and got it solved. In general it is a good car seat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: This is a great seat, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat, especially for the money. It’s sturdy and well built. The easy adjust head rest gets rid of having to re-thread the belts when you child grows. My son loves the snack cubby and drink holder, I love that they are built in and not made of pieces that can be removed from the seat. We drive 600 miles a week, so there is a lot of time spent in this seat. It cleans up easy and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne

customer_reviews.title: overall decent budget seat
customer_reviews.text: can't speak to safety or use as a booster, but as a harness seat it's pretty good for the price (well, I got it on lightning deal). My kids like the little cubbies in the armrest to squirrel away their candies and trinkets. Installation system also is not premium, but I don't have need to take the seat out very often. Sides of headrest offer enough support for them to comfortably fall asleep. I do like that once the kids are bigger it can be an ordinary big kid booster.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Diva

customer_reviews.title: Even the toddler likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My folks babysit my daughter fairly routinely, so it quickly became clear that they needed a car seat for their car while I was at work. This was the one we settled on and she loves it more than she loves the one in my car (also a Graco, but a 4-in-1). I kind of like it a little better, too, because it sits a little more upright because it is for after the infant-reverse stage and I kind of wish I had given them the one from my car. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: and I really don't feel like it's very safe
customer_reviews.text: Fitted to an XC60, it still slides around with a lot of movement, no matter how much you tighten the LATCH straps Center clips slide all the way down the sides, disappearing into the seat I wish I had returned this. It's inconvenient, and I really don't feel like it's very safe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 year old granddaughter. She is a bit tall for her age and it fits her great. She likes the little compartments in the sides for her toys and the cup holder. This will be used for a couple more years as she grows since it is able to be converted to other functions like a booster seat etc....
customer_reviews.author: Wyldwestaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this seat! My kids do too. we got the blue and pink one and car rides seem to be easier. I cant wait to see how it goes once we get rid of the 5 point harness and the backing.
customer_reviews.author: confidential

customer_reviews.title: my son no longer fights to be on the carseat it's comfortable, sits higher than other infants rest facing and ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, my son no longer fights to be on the carseat it's comfortable, sits higher than other infants rest facing and front facing carseats, and I love that he now enjoys the view fromthe window and feels like a table taller kid. It fit perfect in the seat, reclines as the seat would, easy to mount and padding is easily removed so it can be washed and there's a hidden compartment for the inductions.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, but fundamentally crappy design for adjusting belt between legs.
customer_reviews.text: I have spent 30 minutes trying to move the central belt (the one that goes between the legs) to a different position. The design simply sucks. They put such a narrow opening that it is IMPOSSIBLE to push through the metal clip through such a narrow hole. Graco - your design of that belt adjustment is really bad, you should rethink it.
customer_reviews.author: Roman S

customer_reviews.title: It was amazingly easy to figure out where everything went
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheapish Walmart seat before buying this. It was amazingly easy to figure out where everything went, comes with instructions of course. My daughter loves this seat. Shes comfortable, has a place for her cup and side areas for storage. This seat will last until she won't need a booster anymore, so it's really a great deal. I feel like my daughter is very safe and secure in this seat and will be buying one for my youngest when shes's of age.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hurt

customer_reviews.title: I found it impossible to move the harness and lap ...
customer_reviews.text: I found it impossible to move the harness and lap buckle to the larger settings as my child grew. The sticking was too close to the buckle so there was no way to get it through the hole. I have had several other Graco car seats and have never had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Booster Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This was bought so I could help with grandkids and its wonderful. Easy to install and east to operate for us "older" folks. Would recommend this as an option for grandkids if you need a car seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... other Graco Nautilus car seats and the quality seems excellent. The only thing I do not like about ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two to replace other Graco Nautilus car seats and the quality seems excellent. The only thing I do not like about this product is that the area where the harnesses buckle (groin area), it seems like a really tight fit and we cannot figure out how to adjust them. My son complains this is too tight and he still has several years to go in a car seat. This could just be a user error, but thought I would point out to others considering this seat.
customer_reviews.author: GJM_BURGH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first bby now on to the next. Its nice not bulky, my son prefer this one and it looks like his more comfortable in this one. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy seat!
customer_reviews.text: Good seat for our kid. i like the 3 in 1 functionality very much too. it is comfortable for the kids and easy to transport. This is a really great buy. I like the fact that it can continue to grow with my toddler. I also like the convenience of pressing a button to adjust strap height. The cushion is comfy. It has side cubbies for snacks or toys.
customer_reviews.author: Madhu N

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable, easy
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat and so does our son. He is 3 but very large for his age, meeting the size requirements. He can get in so easily and says, "mom, the seat is comfortable." He actually prefers one car over the other because of this seat. Eventually, we plan on getting another one. It was so easy to install and very easy to buckle in a kid. It fits easy into our Sonata.
customer_reviews.author: Wrigley17

customer_reviews.title: Harness adjustment strap difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This seat had great reviews, but we found the harness adjustment strap that tightens the harness to be EXTREMELY difficult to pull and tighten the harness with our 2-year old daughter in it. I’m not an engineer, but it seems like the adjustable headrest pinches the harness shoulder straps when set at lower positions for smaller children. I checked multiple times to make sure nothing was catching or pinched between the baby seat and vehicle seat to no avail. Returning this seat tomorrow. We’ve got the Graco Slimfit in our other vehicle, and it’s awesome in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great buy. I like the fact that it can continue to grow with my toddler. I also like the convenience of pressing a button to adjust strap height. The cushion is comfy. It has side cubbies for snacks or toys. The only trouble I had with this chair is adjusting the location of the buckle. It took some work.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this seat to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this seat so much. Perfect for our 2 year old. She love that is has a cup holder. Very safe and sturdy. I have already recommended to my Mommy friends and co workers, so now I will recommend to you all. This seat is just lovely with the colors, but also the comfort of the seat is outstanding. There are also little cubbies in the inner sides so my daughter likes to put her toys or snacks there while riding down the road. Such a great seat!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Gives peace of mind that my child is safely fastened.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is not rear facing but is great for a Toddler over the age of 2 that meets all the height and weight restrictions. Great padding and high quality features. Zero problems with installation. I highly recommend this car seat. I also recommend this seller. Excellent customer service and prompt responses.
customer_reviews.author: S.R. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite seat so far
customer_reviews.text: As foster parents we have lots of cars eats and have to change them to different car quite often. This is my favorite seat so far. Even my 3 year old commented he liked it better than his old seat. Pretty neutral colors, easy to install. The cover comes off easy to wash and the height adjustment is way simpler than other seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, especially for this price..
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't tighten very easily using the anchors in my car. Also doesn't tighten evenly when I'm buckling my kid in. On our last carseat we could play with the straps until they were even, this one I tug back and forth to get each side the same length and it does nothing. I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H. Coon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this carseat! I bought the blue one for my daughter because it was available and I needed it in a pinch. It is not overly boyish and is extremely functional. The seat has two little storage places in the sides under the arm rests where she keeps her little car toys and the cup holder makes her feel like a big girl. She doesn't even struggle with me when I put her in this seat (if you knew her, you would understand how big of a deal that is). Such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Favorite carseat
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat yet. Comfy, snug and strong; bought for my son who needed an upgrade liked it so much ended up buying another one for my other son who had just gotten a new seat last fall. Very happy with this. The green/grey/black is “fern” the grey/blue/black is “sully”
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat. Takes up less room than others in the back of my Ridgeline. Now my 3 year old son feet aren't constantly pushing on my seat. The only thing I will recommend is getting the straps and buckle in the right position before lifting your kid up into the vehicle. This will alleviate the struggle of getting them out from under them every time.
customer_reviews.author: zjl23

customer_reviews.title: Great Grandson Loves this
customer_reviews.text: He's been growing like a weed and this car seat seems to be just what it needed to a growing boy! Plenty of leg, loads of safety features, and easy to get him in & out.
customer_reviews.author: Arky3636

customer_reviews.title: Once installed I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old. She's tall for her age and weighs over 40 lbs so we use this with the 5 point harness. Once installed I love everything about it. BUT its not easy to install. We bought a different one for use in mine and my husbands cars. Once installed in my fathers Chevy Silverado and its awesome. Not the best choice for a seat that is shared in multiple vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- this is my second one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second car seat of the same type (i have two kids) they hold up well for many years and allow for changing kids sizes - not too hard to install or change - seem very safe - I love the little storage areas and cupholders.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oppenheim

customer_reviews.title: The best car Seat I've seen...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best car she made today ... I bought this for my son and his wife and my grandbaby and this seat will probably take her at least through seven years old and has all kinds of great features ... just don't even bother looking at the other seats and buy this one ...
customer_reviews.author: Deryl Houser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat, I have an HHR and it fits wonderfully, I had bought a different car seat that wouldn't fit properly. Fits my grandson perfectly and there will never be a need to take it out and readjust for straps because the back raises with straps attached. It feels very padded and seems to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Booth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Booster Chair
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. HOWEVER, I wish someone would produce a chair with belt releases that are easy to use , without wrecking your arm and hand to tighten or release the belt!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Now she's able to buckle herself in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old that was outgrowing our other car seat. I prefer the safety of a 5 point harness as my daughter is on the petite side. This is perfect. Now she's able to buckle herself in the morning, but not unbuckle and she's almost 6.
customer_reviews.author: New Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the cute color and sleek look, this car seat is also easy to install! Using the latch system in my 2006 Chevy Uplander, I was able to install the nautilus in 5 minutes. It is a tad on the heavy side but I feel it makes the car seat feel sturdier. We used Safety 1st convertible car seat before and while I liked that it was lighter, it didn't feel as secure as this one does. I highly recommend it so far!
customer_reviews.author: tamntrav1990

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and good cupholders, but it stops there
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why carseat manufacturers don't put the more functional button latch on all carseats. This LATCH is too difficult for Grandma to do. Cute design and good cupholders, but it stops there. The seat doesn't *feel* safe, especially the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Its fine!!
customer_reviews.text: Its fine!!! We like. The only thing that I don’t like is that the belts are hard to lose and if I need to move the carseat to Other car it is hard to lose the belts. So I’m frustraded with that. I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Durling

customer_reviews.title: It was a great upgrade for my 4 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: It was a great upgrade for my 4 1/2 year old. She loves the cup holder. This will be the last carseat we buy, since we can adjust it and then convert to a booster when she is ready. Worst part was moving the straps!! Go to YouTube for helpful hints. Graco directions don't help.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I'm guessing because he was very comfortable. Added to that
customer_reviews.text: The first time I put my son into this car seat, he was so quiet and even fell asleep. I'm guessing because he was very comfortable. Added to that, this car seat has many good reviews and I wanted something that is affordable and safe for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... seat in different color for other vehicle because I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying 2nd seat in different color for other vehicle because I love it so much! Cup holder fits most cups and little hideaway compartments inside the arms. Easy to tighten the straps and good support around the head. So far have only used for toddler (2 yrs old) but don't anticipate issues with adjusting as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: *Courtney*

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall children.
customer_reviews.text: We are 3 weeks in and we love our new car seat. My daughter is very tall (in the 98% for her age) and this seat seems to give her more leg room than her prior seat. I'm glad we've got a seat that will last her through her next transition.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful 3-in-1!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat 3-in-1 is a great buy! I found it to be very straight forward and simple to use. Love the adjustment features and the storage. If your looking for a new one that will last you for a long time to come I personally would look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to every mom out there!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this seat. No need to spend hundreds on some trendy brand... This has all the safety, style, comfort, and functionality you need for less than half the price... how can you not love it?!
customer_reviews.author: MrsFisher

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and they are wonderful. No issues with them fitting in the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are wonderful. No issues with them fitting in the seat and they sit up a little so that my 4 year old can be seen a little easier by me. Also so excited that it will be the last one I will ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Maness

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1 is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! This is the second one we have bought (for 2nd child). Extremely durable and love that it grows with your child. The first one we bought when our oldest was about 2 1/2 y/o and he’s using the booster seat now (age 5) and have not had to replace or buy anything extra for it. The cup holder is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Can't use until 2 years old
customer_reviews.text: I searched for convertible car seats and this one showed up. Yes it does convert from a forward facing seat to a booster, but it does not allow for rear facing seating. This is problematic given the American Pediatric Assoc is now recommending rear facing seats until the age of 2. We loved the seat, but it ultimately wasn't right for us, as we wanted to move our 1-year old into a larger seat but this wouldn't work unless we wanted to turn him around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Method to removing center seat strap!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our convertible booster and am very pleased. I messed around with the center safety strap and figured out how to remove without any tools. You place the metal retainer with one end through the slot, pulling downwards on the strap while at the same time lifting up on the other side under the metal retainer and it pops out. Hope the description and pictures help!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BEST CARSEAT EVER
customer_reviews.text: My daughter feels like a big girl in this car seat and I feel safe with her in it. It’s heavy and durable. May purchase one for my second car just because lugging it between the two cars will be annoying
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this booster seat, and love even more that we got a great deal on it. This is the last seat i will have to purchase as the height and weight limits will take my kiddo all the through childhood. My son loves the cup holder and the snack slots in the booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: After doing countless reviews on this and many other car seats for my son I choose this one. It came in right on time and was pretty easy to set up in my car . When my son first saw his new car seat he smiled he really loved it . He looks the storage department is has on both sides to stick his cars in there and the cup holder is a plus :) . Now I don't have to fight to put him in his car seat , the padding is great . Will definitely recommend this car seat to any mom who is unsure and is looking for something that is not too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice seat, the padding is very well done
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat, the padding is very well done. I bought this to replace my kid's rear facing car seat. It feels much more safer than my old car seat and I am glad that I purchased this. It'll last for until he's grown enough for school.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pand

customer_reviews.title: Very good carseat
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much, after I was rear-ended at 50mph and my daughter had zero injuries, I decide to get the exact same one to replace it. Very sturdy and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these car seats. They are a pain to take in and out of the car but we love the fact that they have a little storage pockets for toys or sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It is impossible to change the bucket
customer_reviews.text: Changing the buckle in this car seat is all but impossible. I have a Chicco car seat and changing the bucket was no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice carseat. It will be the last car seat I will need to get for my grandson as it is adjustable so it can also convert to a booster seat. Very nicely made and sturdy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tylrsgma

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful carseat! It has side impact head protection. Its a very secure seat. Safe. Especially like the versatility of the stages. From toddler to preschool age! It's cushy, easy to assemble, easy to clean & the drink holder is spill-proof. Best carseat i've personally ever bought! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat as a replacement for a safety first alpha omega (ugh). It was so easy to install. It took less than 5 minutes (as opposed to the 30 i tried with the other Ine and it STILL wasnt tight enough). Very comfortable with plenty of head support for a car sleeper. Im so glad i bought this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat Have had one of these for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat Have had one of these for my first child for over a year and bought my second one recently for my 3 year old who is graduating from his first car seat. He loves this one especially the built in cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bother to do more research
customer_reviews.text: It's wide for no real reason (the arm rests are huge, kids don't even use arm rests). The buckles are always beneath the children, difficult to fish out. When the kids doze, their head drops forward (doesn't tilt back enough to allow them to loll to the side). I thought it would be nice to replace our ancient Britax Marathons for our 4 year olds, but now I miss those old worn out Marathons. Oh well. We will adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beefy seat
customer_reviews.text: Great beefy seat! It's pretty heavy too. We also purchased a seat protector to put under this to protect the leather seats in our vehicle. I was using the anchors, but after having to remove the seat a few times after some car sickness I just use the seatbelt to secure. Those anchors work too good!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D

customer_reviews.title: Need better head support when kids fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is when grandkids fall asleep it seems like their little heads just fall forward. I hope grace tries to improve this with future designs in their car seats. Have not found a good car seat yet when it comes to the kids falling asleep in them.
customer_reviews.author: martha volz

customer_reviews.title: Only brand I trust!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and safe. Worth every penny. And easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and we're glad we made the decision to buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Researching a car-seat can be a daunting task, and we're glad we made the decision to buy this one. Easy install, comfortable ride, and great safety rating. We love the fact that our son can use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E

customer_reviews.title: Good features. Hard to tighten
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. My 2yr old son fits well and likes his new seat. He really like the compartments in the arms. Both my husband and Have trouble with the tightening strap, it is very hard to pull and it's awkward to get the right angle. Luckily it doesn't deter us from tightening his seat but it can be a challenge
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Cute seat, had to return because it wasn't rear ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute seat, had to return because it wasn't rear facing, which was my own mistake. The box says the last car seat you'll ever need which is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: $am n €had

customer_reviews.title: Have a seat
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality car seat. Had police officer say he would put his own kids in this seat. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat with adjustable bottom buckle and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these car seats now. This one was slightly different. I had a harder time securing it using the bottom latch system. So I went with the seat belt. Great car seat with adjustable bottom buckle and easy to adjust head rest and shoulder belt height.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Tight Buckle Stalk Slot
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, REALLY tight when moving buckle stalk. I have literally used a hammer to get it through the slot to adjust it to the right position. I'm a Certified Passenger Safety Technician in KS and I check seats all the time. First time I have ever had to use a hammer to move the buckle stalk.
customer_reviews.author: Single woman.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable seat. I prefer the release button latch system on other seats to the hooks on this one but if you're not changing the seat from car to car regularly then it is probably fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bleakley

customer_reviews.title: ... of these and they seem very safe and very easy to install in the car
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and they seem very safe and very easy to install in the car. Our kids (5 year old and 2 year old) feel very comfortable in these car seats. They have a very nice design and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Great Carseat!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Nautilus 65 3-in-1 and we bought is because we love the first one. Easy to install and comfy, with plenty of storage space, it's ideal for our kids - who are generally tall for their age. It is heavy, but provides good support and has been a great fit for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got this for my grand kids
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, and I have no problem installing. It will grow with my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: RKWood62

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this car seat several months ago and love it! It is easy to install, and comfortable for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat. It's easy to install, and adjusts well to my child. He loves sitting forward. (BTW this is not rear facing). So far it's been great and suited our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: We had the older version of this seat and this is pretty much the same
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seat to replace our old car seat as we had been in a car accident. We had the older version of this seat and this is pretty much the same. It is a great seat! We have not used it as a high back booster or regular booster seat as our son is not old enough yet. It is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: This is an Amazing car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing car seat. My son is so comfortable, it adjusts so easily and I feel like he is so protected in it. Definitely worth paying a little more for this nicer car seat than a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Aston

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it was fine. Another matter bothered me
customer_reviews.text: The car seat was a little harder to install than I planned. Other than that it was fine. Another matter bothered me. The box that it was in was torn all the way from the top to bottom. If this was a gift, it would have been a problem. Next delivery I got which was a baby carrier for a gift also had a ripped box. Very disappointing. Not to AmAzon standards.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Barile

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Comfortable. Easy to buckle and unbuckle. Cup holder so convenient. Seat (fabric and hardware) have held up thru all the stages. Easy conversion to booster.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Howell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! 'My daughter use it now and she loves it!!! Graco is the best! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bhe

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: grandson is safe but with RA in my fingers it's very difficult to install & take out
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to tighten
customer_reviews.text: The strap that tightens the shoulder strap is very difficult to pull. To loosen is fine but when you want to tighten as a grown man I have a hard time pulling it to the right distance. No issues other than that.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable chair, you get more padding the more you ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable chair, you get more padding the more you pay, but it works, and the kids are safe. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I'm not thrilled about is how difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm not thrilled about is how difficult it is for a child to get over the arm to get in from the seat of the car. It is even harder from the floor of the car. If the arm could raise or be removed I wouldn't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Graco Nautilus 65 3-in-1 car seat for about a month now. I am very happy with it. I would say the quality is excellent. The seat belts and latches are easy to use. Most importantly I feel confident that my son is safe in this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN in Anaheim

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy but difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall but very difficult to install. Wrenching down the lower latch tethers are a bit of a chore. Some systems (Chicco) have a pulley system to make securing the lower tether much easier. Why doesn’t a major company like Graco have this feature??
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Comegys

customer_reviews.title: Budget-friendly option
customer_reviews.text: Great on a budget, Fits in a variety of types of cars. Does sit a little deep, so my four year old has a hard time crawling up into it at times.
customer_reviews.author: BartelBees

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat, it is the 3rd car seat I have purchased and I wish I would have started with this one. My mom is getting ready to purchase one for her car!
customer_reviews.author: JCFred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: only booster car seat with 5 point harness that reclines at this price point!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Graco products forever and this seat is fantastic much like most of their products. Easy to use and durable. The last one I bought is on year 3 for my almost 4 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: they just didn't work like they're supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Straps will not tighten by pulling. Both of the tether straps would not budge when I pulled on them, they were not twisted or bunched up, they just didn't work like they're supposed to. I ended up just slowly threading it through, before latching it and with great effort, I got it latched on so it wouldn't wobble much. Buy Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco Nautilus 65 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat, Sully, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:SullyFinally, the car seat that parents have been searching for is here! Our Nautilus 3-in-1 car seat helps keep your child secure from 22 to 100 lbs. Nautilus is a 3-in-1 car seat that converts from a harnessed booster to a high back belt-positioning booster and finally to a backless belt positioning booster. The harness booster can be used up to 65lbs, and as your little one continues to grow, the Nautilus does too, transitioning into a Highback belt positioning booster which can be used from 30 – 100lbs, and finally into a Backless belt positioning booster for a comfortable fit from 40 to 100 lbs. The seat is designed to help keep your child in a harness booster longer as well as to fit them up to 57" tall. You can easily see Graco's commitment to safety as this seat is extensively crash tested to meet or exceed U.S safety standards, side-impact testing, and outfitted with reinforced steel for effective energy management. Nautilus has been thoughtfully designed with plush comfort features, an integrated cup holder and storage compartments, as well as a one-hand height adjustable headrest to help keep your growing child happy on even the longest rides! This 3-in-1 car seat is will last your little travel companion well into childhood. Care and Maintenance- Metal and plastic parts may be cleaned with mild soap and cool water. Buckle may be cleaned with a damp cloth. Harness straps may be spot cleaned. Recommended Use- Fits toddlers 22-65lbs forward facing in harness .
feature_bullets: 3-in-1 harness booster helps protect your child from toddler to youth
Front facing car seat harness booster (22 - 65 lb.), high back booster (30 - 100 lb.), backless booster (40 - 100 lb.)
Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the height of your harness and headrest in one motion, to ensure that your child is always properly secured
3-position recline helps keep your growing child comfy
Side-impact tested for occupant retention with built-in 5-point harness system

Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,225 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
